attachments.fallback:
patch 7.4.1817
Problem:    The screen is not updated if a callback is invoked when closing a
            channel.
Solution:   Invoke redraw_after_callback().
attachments.title: patch 7.4.1817
attachments.text:
patch 7.4.1817
Problem:    The screen is not updated if a callback is invoked when closing a
            channel.
Solution:   Invoke redraw_after_callback().
